entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
